meanings.definition: A form of color blindness affecting the ability to distinguish between red and green.
meanings.sent1: His deuteranopias made it hard for him to tell if the traffic light was red or green.
meanings.sent2: People with deuteranopias may struggle to see the difference between ripe tomatoes and unripe ones.
meanings.sent3: During the art class, his deuteranopias led to a funny mix-up between painting the grass red and the apples green.
meanings.sent4: Her deuteranopias turned the colorful garden into a confusing blend of red and green hues.
meanings.sent5: The world through deuteranopias eyes is a puzzling palette of reds and greens.

meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that his deuteranopias was a result of a genetic condition.
meanings.sent2: Living with deuteranopias means adapting to a world where red and green may look the same.
meanings.sent3: His deuteranopias was so pronounced that his friends joked he saw the world in Christmas colors all year round.
meanings.sent4: In a world of deuteranopias, the traffic lights lose their distinct red and green signals.
meanings.sent5: The artist's deuteranopias added a unique perspective to his paintings, blending reds and greens in unexpected ways.
